name: Winter City Off-road Hill Bus Driving Simulator 3D
name_original: Winter City Off-road Hill Bus Driving Simulator 3D
description:
Crazy drive the Snow Hill Bus on dangerous Mountain Roads!
Double the fun of crazy hill climbing with this downhill bus driving game. Drive the jumbo buses on curvy paths and treacherous turns in gorgeous hill station environment. Enjoy off road drive adventure in heavy snowfall to transport passengers. Pick up passengers; navigate your way and steer giant wheels on hill roads through the breathtaking hilly areas and eye catching landscapes. Experience some thrilling tourism fun with Bus Driving Simulator!

Hurry Up! Passengers are waiting at the stop. Get behind the steering wheel and perform the duty of mountain bus driver. Pick and drop passengers in extreme winter snow. Show mountain tourist the amazing hilly areas and beautiful landscapes. Don’t forget to refuel your super vehicle on the way.

Features
10 adventurous & thrilling public transport missions
Amazing Hill Station environment with winter snowfall
Pick and Drop Tourist to their Destinations
Real vehicle physics & smooth driving controls
Cool paints, Tires upgrades, Damage Repair
